resources.string: Please ensure that you have a stable connection to the internet as the app requires it to retrieve user profiles from the web.\nYou may click the button below to restart the application.

Due to an unspecified error the app can not continue functioning.
If this issue persists consider filing a bug report.

You may click the button below to restart the app.
An error has occurred with the api, please try again later.\nClick the button below to start the application.
An internal error has occurred.\nYou may restart the app by clicking the button below.

Congratulations! You found the Easter egg.
